text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Malung-Sälens kommun | native_name = | native_name_lang = sv | settlement_type = Municipality | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Malung vapen.svg | shield_alt = | image_map = Malung-Sälen Municipality in Dalarna County.png | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Sweden | subdivision_type1 = County | subdivision_name1 = Dalarna County | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = Seat | seat = Malung | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = Area as of . | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_note = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = Province | blank_info_sec1 = Dalarna | blank1_name_sec1 = Municipal code | blank1_info_sec1 = 2023 | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = SE | website = www.malung.se | footnotes = Density is calculated using land area only. }} Malung-Sälen Municipality () is a municipality in Dalarna County in central Sweden. The seat is in Malung. The municipality was created in 1971. It was originally called Malung Municipality (). In 2007, the Government of Sweden decided to change the name as of 1 January 2008 to promote the ski resort of Sälen.Government Press Release, 1 March 2007 ==References== ==Other websites== * Malung-Sälen Municipality Category:Municipalities of Dalarna County
